channel.description:
###### Damn it this is dumb. # Rules: **1) Every Post must have a class included.** Can be an existing one or new. If the class is an existing FoL class, the name is simply enough to qualify it. If it is a class that is already in this thread, put down the name hyperlinked to the post in this thread that includes its class card. Otherwise, you MUST provide a class card **2) Include the post number of your post in its description.** A post number may only cover one class + any of its conversions. **3) This can interact with other classes directly**. It can make the game extremely swingy or broken, it can do whatever you like.
# 1. ># Bastard Host >**Game Special** >**Infinite Power(Passive)-** You can do whatever you like, interact with the game in any way you like.
This passive is added alongside your class. Reroll this slot.

item.dc:creator: James
item.description:
19

The Angel

There Cannot be Good Without Evil to Push Against it (Passive) - You will spawn only if The Demon spawns.
Holy Shield (Passive) - You are unable to be targeted by The Demon’s abilities. You will not be hosting The Demon.
Thought (Day) - Select a player. They will be forced to L-2 instantly. Doesn’t affect majority. This counts as your vote, so you cannot vote for the rest of the day - Infinite Uses.
Memory (Day) - Select a player. If they are the Demon, they will be locked out of their Demon ClassCard, being forced to use their other one until the following day. If you select a normal player, nothing will happen - 3 uses.
Holy Fire (Night) - Select a player. If they are in hell, they will be revived - however their limited abilities will be burnt away - 2 uses.
Holy Wings (Night) - Select a player. They cannot be cast into Hell tonight - Infinite Uses.
Defeat the Demon at any costs.

item.title: Grande Idea - Broken Classes
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
17

Mod Shield

Neutral Support
Passive 1: Mod Save - So long as you are alive, all players are immune to Modkills that are as a result of abilities. After blocking a modkill the player is healed and immune to death, this cannot be bypassed. Modkills as a result of the player breaking forum rules will resolve as normal.
Passive 2: Hotline - For the purposes of this class, suicides count as modkills. Thus suicides are blocked by mod save and proc the wincon

Day Ability: Clone shift - Modkill yourself (2 uses)

Night Ability: If target player is attacked, Modkill them (Unlimited)

Goal: Trigger mod save on 3 different people besides yourself

  • Reroll this class if no other class is capable of causing a modkill or suicide to occur.

Read full topic

item.title: Grande Idea - Broken Classes
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
16

The Demon

Neutral Chaos
Keeping the Demon down (Passive) - You will instantly be modkilled fliplessly. You can choose a player and permanently hydra them. You will have access to their ClassCard. If they allow you to take control, you will unlock both the rest of your card and their card. They will hydra you instead. You will be able to speak in their place. If you complete your wincon, they will also win.
You Cannot Stop Me (Passive) - If attacked, you will always survive the attack. You can only die if you are lynched once and attacked three consecutive nights.
Throw a building on them (Day) - Instantly skyrocket one player to L-1. This doesn’t affect majority. You cannot vote for the rest of the game - Infinite Uses.
Nuclear Repulsion (Day) - All votes on you will be scattered randomly onto others. If someone votes you after this for the rest of the game, you will Throw a building on them. This doesn’t affect usages - Infinite Uses.
Gateway to Hell (Night) - Send a player to hell. They cannot survive this - Infinite Uses.
Biding your time (Night) - Redirect all attacks on you to a player of your choice - Infinite Uses.
Be the last player alive. KILL THEM ALL.

Read full topic

item.description:
8
Pirate
Neutral Chaos
Constantly drunk (Passive): immune to occupation
Locate riches (Day): choose a target to plunder at the start of the night, you and the victim get to choose one of three options in a rock, paper, scissors style encounter. Your options are: scimitair, rapier and pistol. Your victims options are: sidestep, chainmail and backpedal. Scimitair beats sidestep, rapier beats chainmail and pistol beats backpedal. If you win you will attack your opponent and earn 1 plunder -Infinite Uses
Goal - succesfully plunder 2 people

item.description:
7

Baker

Neutral Special
Take me to the butter(Passive)- You will know who carries the butter.
Eat the butter(Day)- If you have the butter, Eat it. - Infinite Uses.
Take the butter(Night)- If a dead player has the butter, you will take it - Infinite Uses.
Goal - Eat the butter.

  1. One player will spawn with the butter. They will know this.
  2. If they are killed, their attacker will take it.
  3. They can pass the butter on.
  4. If lynched, no one will take the butter.
